tool_description: Provides detailed interpretations of planetary house placements and analyzes house emphasis patterns.

planet_houses.description: Array indicating which house each planet occupies (1-12).

planet_names.description: Names corresponding to the house positions.

interpretation_depth.description: Interpretation detail level: brief, moderate, or detailed.

focus_empty_houses.description: Whether to comment on empty houses.

error_messages: Invalid house numbers: All values must be integers between 1 and 12.
Array length mismatch: planet_houses and planet_names arrays must be same length.
Invalid planet names: Use standard astrological planet names.
usage: Provide planetary house positions with planet names, choose interpretation depth, and specify whether to analyze empty houses.

house_interpretations.description: Detailed interpretations for each planetary house placement

house_emphasis.description: Count of planets in each house (1-12)
